org.orgName: Army of the Tennessee, District of West Tennessee

body.p: This Army was created on February 17, 1862. It consisted of Federal Forces operating with Grant on the Mississippi River. Became a part of the Department of the Mississippi on March 8, 1862. It was disbanded and combined into the Department of the Tennessee on October 16, 1862. Commander(s): Ulysses S. Grant
